import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Popup from 'reactjs-popup'; class Gallery extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { open : false } this.openModal = this.openModal.bind(this); this.closeModal = this.closeModal.bind(this); } openModal(e){ e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ open : true }); } closeModal(){ this.setState({ open : false }); } render(){ return( <>
